## OmitPrefixed type

Construct a type with the properties of `TProps` except for those which has prefix `TPrefix` (string literal).

**Signature:**

```typescript
export type OmitPrefixed<TProps, TPrefix> = {
    [TKey in keyof TProps as UnprefixedKey<TKey, TPrefix> extends never ? TKey : never]: TProps[TKey];
};
```
**References:** [UnprefixedKey](./use-prefixed-props.unprefixedkey.md)

## Example


```ts
 type Props = { foo: unknown, "foo-bar": unknown }
 type ExceptFoo = OmitPrefixed<Props, "foo">
 // { foo: unknown }
```
